meanings.definition: The ability to be packed or arranged efficiently for transportation or storage.
meanings.sent1: Her packabilities made her the best at fitting everything into a small suitcase.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase's packabilities allowed for easy organization of all the clothes.
meanings.sent3: His packabilities were so impressive that he could fit a week's worth of clothes in a tiny bag.
meanings.sent4: The packabilities of the storage boxes were like a puzzle, fitting perfectly together.
meanings.sent5: The packabilities of the backpack were so convenient that she never had to worry about running out of space.

meanings.definition: The potential for being easily packed or carried.
meanings.sent1: The packabilities of the bag made it ideal for carrying groceries.
meanings.sent2: When considering luggage, the packabilities of the duffel bag stood out.
meanings.sent3: The packabilities of the backpack were put to the test when he tried to fit all his books inside.
meanings.sent4: Her purse had amazing packabilities, fitting everything she needed in a compact space.
meanings.sent5: The packabilities of the picnic basket made it easy to bring all the food for the outing.
